signals.msg: VALIDATE: Anti-theater gate PASSES. Honest demo created. 8 pre-commit gates active. Production code uses HFO adapter bundle only.

INTERLOCK: Starting anti-theater enforcement + honest demo. Goal: (1) Pre-commit gate blocks inline exemplar code (2) Demo MUST import from adapters/ (3) Adapters MUST import npm packages. Zero tolera

COLD START: Spider Sovereign awakened. Memory loaded (70+ entities). Blackboard: 275 signals Dec29-31. REAL: 642 tests GREEN, W3C pointer factory 37/37, SmootherChain 43/43, OneEuroExemplarAdapter 12/

HANDOFF: FSM Hysteresis Architecture complete. 4 states (IDLE/TRACKING/PRESSED/COASTING). Schmitt Triggers for all gates - no magic numbers. GateConfig injectable. Palm hysteresis 25-35deg band. Gestu
HANDOFF: Gen87.X3 session complete. Files: rapier-physics.adapter.ts (REAL WASM), 4-cursor-simple.html (working demo). Next: validate in browser, tune params.
HUNT: Fixed Golden Layout UMD issue - created 4-cursor-simple.html without GL dependency. Pure CSS grid layout.
HUNT: Rate limit hit - preparing handoff. Demo server running at localhost:8080. Rapier WASM confirmed working via CDN import.
HUNT: Built 4-cursor production demo at sandbox/demos/production/4-cursor-compare.html - Golden Layout + MediaPipe + raw/1euro/rapier-smooth/rapier-predict
HUNT: Created REAL Rapier WASM adapter at sandbox/src/adapters/rapier-physics.adapter.ts - spring-damper physics with smoothed + predictive modes

HUNT: FSM CORRECTED - COAST not freeze on tracking loss (Rapier physics). Palm orientation FIRST CLASS gate (angle not boolean). Only 3 gestures: None/Open_Palm/Pointing_Up. Palm roll = immediate canc
HUNT: FSM analysis complete. Key findings: (1) Current FSM lacks SNAPLOCK state for tracking loss recovery, (2) Palm cone is boolean not angle-based, (3) Missing None transition state from MediaPipe,
SENSE: "XState FSM gesture pointer state machine mermaid" â†’ 10 results from [memory, code]
